title: Bitcoin Holds at $56K as Liquidated Short Tally Reaches $280 Million
description: Bitcoin open interest has now surpassed $25 billion, according to Coinglass data.

title: HTX reenters race for Hong Kong crypto license days after withdrawing initial bid
description:
Justin Sun-related crypto exchange HTX, formerly Huobi, has resubmitted its application for a Virtual Asset Trading Platform (VATP) license in Hong Kong. This move comes after it was reported to have withdrawn its initial application, according to a notice on the Securities and Futures Commission (SFC) website. The initial application, filed through its Hong Kong […]

The post HTX reenters race for Hong Kong crypto license days after withdrawing initial bid appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Stablecoins market cap hits $142B, Highest Since the 2022 crypto winter
description: Stablecoins, a crucial component of the crypto ecosystem, have witnessed a remarkable surge as the market cap recently surpassed $142 billion, marking its highest point since 2022. This milestone has been propelled by notable developments, including the resurgence of Circle’s USDC (USD Coin) and the continued growth of Tether (USDT), as highlighted in recent reports. […]

title: Financial Industry Expresses Concerns Over AI Integration
description: The financial industry is abuzz with discussions surrounding the incorporation of artificial intelligence (AI) into their operations. Amidst this chatter, a significant sentiment of concern prevails among industry professionals. Industry concerns A recent survey conducted by [Professional Adviser](https://www.professionaladviser.com) revealed that more than one-third of industry stakeholders are “very concerned” about integrating AI into their businesses. title: Three Ethereum Whales Abruptly Accumulate $64,000,000 Worth of ETH From Binance and Kraken in Last Six Days
description:
Three Ethereum (ETH) whales abruptly withdrew more than $64 million worth of the second-largest digital asset from a pair of centralized exchanges in a matter of days, according to the crypto tracker Lookonchain. Lookonchain reports that one whale withdrew 14,632 ETH worth $45.5 million from Binance over six days. The whale subsequently staked all of […]

The post Three Ethereum Whales Abruptly Accumulate $64,000,000 Worth of ETH From Binance and Kraken in Last Six Days appeared first on The Daily Hodl.
